title: To provide energy management by adopting advanced technology like installing Solar Water Heating System, Solar Lamps / Lights in common areas, LED Lamps, auto-operated street lights, solar pumps, etc
clause_text: To provide energy management by adopting advanced technology like installing Solar Water Heating System, Solar Lamps / Lights in common areas, LED Lamps, auto-operated street lights, solar pumps, etc. all external lighting shall be of LED, Solar Water Heating System, Solar Lamp shall be compulsorily provided;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: To provide energy management by adopting advanced technology like installing Solar Water Heating System, Solar Lamps / Lights in common areas, LED Lamps, auto-operated street lights, solar pumps, etc.
